IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: REVEAL THE TRUE LINCOLN AND CONTINUE THE FIGHT FOR FREEDOM.
IRS990.MissionDesc: REVEAL THE TRUE LINCOLN AND CONTINUE THE FIGHT FOR FREEDOM.
IRS990.Desc: PRESERVATION:PRESIDENT LINCOLN'S COTTAGE WORKS (A) TO PRESERVE, RESTORE, AND MAINTAIN THE HISTORICALLY SIGNIFICANT STRUCTURES AND SURROUNDING LANDSCAPE, (B) TO ACQUIRE, MANAGE, CARE, AND USE MUSEUM COLLECTIONS FOR RESEARCH AND EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES, (C) TO RESEARCH, DEVELOP, MANAGE, AND MAINTAIN EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS AND MATERIALS INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO TOURS, EXHIBITS, SYMPOSIA, WORKSHOPS, PUBLICATIONS AND CURRICULUM, AND (D) TO PROVIDE ACTIVITIES THAT SUPPORT STEWARDSHIP AND PRESERVATION INCLUDING MARKETING, OUTREACH AND SPECIAL PROPERTY USE RENTAL, SUCH AS FILMING OR PRIVATE EVENTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PUBLIC OUTREACH:PRESIDENT LINCOLN'S COTTAGE WORKS TO CONNECT THE GENERAL PUBLIC WITH THE AUTHENTIC HISTORIC PLACE, THE LEGACY OF WHAT LINCOLN ACCOMPLISHED WHILE IN RESIDENCE, AND NEW PERSPECTIVES ON LINCOLN'S PUBLIC AND PRIVATE LIFE. PLC DOES THIS THOUGH A WIDE VARIETY OF COMPELLING PROGRAMS, COLLECTIONS, AND EVENTS. THIS INCLUDES (A) OFFERING SIGNATURE, GUIDED EDUCATIONAL TOURS OF PRESIDENT LINCOLN'S COTTAGE AND SELF-GUIDED EXHIBITS DISPLAYING INFORMATION AND MUSEUM COLLECTIONS YEAR-ROUND TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC; (B) ORGANIZING SPECIALTY PROGRAMS EACH YEAR INCLUDING "COTTAGE CONVERSATIONS," "Q&ABE PODCAST," THE "LINCOLN IDEAS FORUM, AND "STUDENTS OPPOSING SLAVERY INTERNATIONAL SUMMIT," WHICH COLLECTIVELY IMPART IN-DEPTH KNOWLEDGE OF (SEE SCH. O) RELATED TOPICS. (C) HOSTING A VARIETY OF RESPONSIVE PUBLIC PROGRAMS AND SPECIAL EVENTS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR TO BEST SERVE THE COMMUNITY; AND (D) ORGANIZING ONLINE AND DIGITAL PROGRAMMING AND ON-SITE, HANDS-ON, HUMANITIES-BASED SCHOOL PROGRAMS TIED DIRECTLY TO PRESIDENT LINCOLN'S LEADERSHIP AS PRESIDENT AND COMMANDER-IN-CHIEF DURING THE CIVIL WAR, ESPECIALLY INCLUDING HIS EVOLVING IDEAS AND ACTIONS TAKEN AGAINST SLAVERY, INCLUDING THE EMANCIPATION PROCLAMATION. IN RESPONSE TO THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC, PLC COMPLETELY CLOSED THE PHYSICAL SITE TO THE PUBLIC FOR 3.5 MONTHS, BUT STAFF CREATED NEW ONLINE PROGRAMS TO CONTINUE TO SERVE OUR AUDIENCES WITH INTERACTIVE EDUCATIONAL CONTENT. AS SOON AS POSSIBLE, PLC BEGAN WELCOMING VISITORS WITH APPROPRIATE HEALTH PRECAUTIONS IN PLACE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PLC MAINTAINS AND INTERPRETS HISTORICAL ARTIFACTS HELD ON LOAN FROM THE NATIONAL TRUST FOR HISTORIC PRESERVATION.

FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2023, THE COTTAGE HAS DOCUMENTED ITS CONSIDERATION OF FASB ASC 740-10, INCOME TAXES, THAT PROVIDES GUIDANCE FOR REPORTING UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES AND HAS DETERMINED THAT NO MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

FUNDRAISING EVENT EXPENSES REPORTED AS AN EXPENSE ON THE 55,088. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND NETTED AGAINST REVENUE ON FORM 990, PART VIII, LINE 8B. DISCOUNTS ON ADMISSIONS NETTED AGAINST REVENUE ON -9,478. THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND REPORTED AS AN EXPENSE ON FORM 990, PART IX, LINE 1.

FUNDRAISING EVENT EXPENSES REPORTED AS AN EXPENSE ON THE 55,088. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND NETTED AGAINST REVENUE ON FORM 990, PART VIII, LINE 8B. DISCOUNTS ON ADMISSIONS NETTED AGAINST REVENUE ON -9,478. THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND REPORTED AS AN EXPENSE ON FORM 990, PART IX, LINE 1.
BONUS COMPENSATION IS REPORTED IN PART II, COLUMN (B)(II).
THIS COLUMN REPORTS THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 WAS PREPARED BY THE OUTSIDE ACCOUNTANTS AND REVIEWED BY SENIOR MANAGEMENT. A COPY OF THE 990 WAS ALSO REVIEWED BY THE BOARD PRIOR TO SUBMISSION WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS AND STAFF ARE REQUIRED TO COMPLETE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST ATTESTATION FORM ANNUALLY. THE BOARD REVIEWS ALL POTENTIAL CONFLICTS AND DETERMINES STEPS TO HANDLE THE CONFLICTS IN PLC'S BEST INTEREST. CONFLICTED MEMBERS DO NOT PARTICIPATE IN THE DISCUSSIONS OF CONFLICTED TOPICS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PLC BOARD USES MARKET DATA FROM THE AMERICAN ALLIANCE OF MUSEUMS SALARY SURVEY AS PART OF ITS COMPENSATION DECISIONS. THE CEO'S CURRENT COMPENSATION WAS APPROVED IN EXECUTIVE SESSION OF THE BOARD MEETING ON MAY 4, 2023.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
